content.rendered: For those of you that recognise this: things are changing a bit around here. It seems to be for the better, but it’s hard to tell at this point.

excerpt.rendered: For those of you that recognise this: things are changing a bit around here. It seems to be for the better, but it’s hard to tell at this point.
